SEARCH
Package src.service

Class ReportService

java.lang.Object
src.service.ReportService
public class ReportService extends Object
Service class for handling report generation, filtering, and display. Interacts with ReportCsvMapper and ReportGenerator to manage booking reports.

      public ReportService()

  • Method Details

    • generateAndSaveReports

      public static void generateAndSaveReports()
      Generates reports for all bookings and saves them to the CSV. Overwrites existing report data in memory and file.

    • getAllReports

      public static List<Report> getAllReports()
      Returns all reports currently loaded in memory.
      Returns:
      List of Report objects.

    • getReportsByProject

      public static List<Report> getReportsByProject(String projectName)
      Filters reports by project name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name to search for.
      Returns:
      List of reports for that project.

    • getReportsByFlatType

      public static List<Report> getReportsByFlatType(String flatType)
      Filters reports by flat type (e.g., 2-Room, 3-Room).
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to filter by.
      Returns:
      List of matching reports.

    • getReportsByPaymentStatus

      public static List<Report> getReportsByPaymentStatus(String status)
      Filters reports by payment status (e.g., Processed, Awaiting Payment).
      Parameters:
      status - Payment status to filter by.
      Returns:
      List of matching reports.

    • getReportsByBookingDateRange

      public static List<Report> getReportsByBookingDateRange(LocalDate start, LocalDate end)
      Filters reports within a booking date range.
      Parameters:
      start - Start date (inclusive).
      end - End date (inclusive).
      Returns:
      List of matching reports.

    • printAllReports

      public static void printAllReports()
      Prints all available reports to the console. If no reports exist, shows a message.

    • printReports

      public static void printReports(List<Report> filteredReports)
      Prints a list of filtered reports to the console.
      Parameters:
      filteredReports - The list of reports to display.
